author: rcm
msg: Extracted out the static methods for getting adapters from PojoAdapter to PojoAdapterFactory (as instance methods).  This factory can now be got from NakedObjects, and should be soon merged with LoadedObjects.

author: rcm
msg: Added unresolvedTitle() to NakedObjectSpecification for allowing framework to get a title from an unresolved object.

author: rcm
msg: Refactor transient object store to store instances each specific type of object is an external object - TransientObjectStoreInstances.  This is much more efficient when storing large numbers of instances.

author: rcm
msg: Added resolveEagerly (to allow object store load up objects early if they are ready) to complement the resolveImmediately request.

author: rcm
msg: Added unresolvedTitle() to NakedObjectSpecification for allowing framework to get a title from an unresolved object.
